name: Fundamental Mechanics X0/j / Van Eyck's Lamb
description:
Fundamental Mechanics 52+20, 2019-2020. Series of miniature animations made on a mediocre iPhone using the Instagram stories feature while researching 16th century visual culture. Based on 16th century alchemy emblema. 

This is a special one, connected to FM X0/i. When the restoration of Van Eyck's Ghent Altarpiece (1432) revealed an uncannily human-looking Lamb of God, The Guardian (jan 22, 2020) likened it to a botched restoration. I disagreed. As a defense, I made a friendly-faced .gif of the restored lamb, which features in this Fundamental Mechanics.

https://alexandracrouwers.com | https://instagram.com/alexa_crwrs | twitter @acrwrs
